snippet: Kim Lene Williams said her husband, a former justice of the peace, killed a district attorney, his wife and another prosecutor in Kaufman County.
abstract: Eric Lyle Williams and his wife Kim Lene Williams are being held in murders of Kaufman County, Tex, prosecutors Mike McLelland and Mark E Hasse, and McLelland's wife Cynthia; Williams's wife says her husband, former justice of peace, committed murders to avenge his being disgraced in legal dispute, and that she was the driver.

byline.original: By MANNY FERNANDEZ and SERGE F. KOVALESKI
byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez reported from Kaufman, Tex., and Serge F. Kovaleski from Boston.

lead_paragraph: Kim Lene Williams said her husband, a former justice of the peace, killed a district attorney, his wife and another prosecutor in Kaufman County.

headline.seo: Woman Charged in Texas Prosecutors’ Killings
headline.main: Disgraced Official’s Wife Accuses Him in Texas Killings
headline.print_headline: Couple Held in the Killings Of Two Texas Prosecutors
